briefTitle: A Phase 3, Long-term, Extension Study of TVP-1012 (1 mg) in Early Parkinson's Disease Participants
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label, Long-term, Extension, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of TVP-1012 at 1 mg in Early Parkinson's Disease Patients Not Treated With Levodopa
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety of TVP-1012 (1 mg/day) in Japanese participants with early Parkinson's disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Experience at Least One Treatment Emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
